entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.6°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to a few flurries and rain showers after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind south 30 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
